Title: Turkey in a Can
Director: Boo Hwan Lim, Kyoung Hee Lim, Bernard Derriman
Writer: Loren Bouchard (created by), Loren Bouchard (developed by), Jim Dauterive (developed by), Lizzie Molyneux, Wendy Molyneux, Steven Davis (executive story editor), Kelvin Yu (executive story editor), Lizzie Molyneux (executive story editor), Wendy Molyneux (executive story editor), Holly Schlesinger (executive story editor)
Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman, Larry Murphy
Plot: Determined to have a perfect Thanksgiving, Bob meticulously prepares the family turkey. But, to his horror, he finds that someone then dumps the turkey in the toilet in an act of Thanksgiving sabotage.
